name: df-em
body: |- wceq(cem, csu(s0, cn, co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(clog, co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)))))))
comment: Define the Euler-Mascheroni constant, ` gamma ` = 0.577.... This is the limit of the series ` sum_ k e. ( 1 ... m ) ( 1 / k ) - ( log `` m ) ` , with a proof that the limit exists in ~ emcl . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)
